name: EMG
description: Tags related to generation of environment models

children.name: Specs
children.description: Tags related to environment model specifications

children.name: Missed category
children.description: There is no corresponding environment model specification at all

children.name: Missed trigger
children.description: Require to model register or deregister function to trigger entry points invocation scenario

children.name: Missed entry point
children.description: An entry point is not called at all

children.name: Bad parameters
children.description: An infeasible entry point parameters initialization

children.name: Bad sequence
children.description: An infeasible sequence of entry point calls

children.name: Bad composition
children.description: An incorrect model of a composition of several entry points invocation scenarios

children.name: Check final state
children.description: Checking final state is redundant and should be avoided

children.name: Linux kernel
children.description: Tags related to Linux kernel API models

children.name: match_string
children.description: Function match_string() needs a model

children.name: v4l2_device_register
children.description: Function v4l2_device_register() needs a model

children.name: usb_find_common_endpoints
children.description: Function usb_find_common_endpoints() needs a model

children.name: kref*
children.description: Functions kref*() need a model

children.name: wmi_evaluate_method
children.description: Function wmi_evaluate_method() needs a model

children.name: input_ff_create_memless
children.description: Function input_ff_create_memless() needs a model

children.name: list*
children.description: Functions list*() need a model

children.name: device_register
children.description: Function device_register() needs a model

children.name: mtd_device_parse_register
children.description: Function mtd_device_parse_register() needs a model

children.name: i2c_new_device
children.description: Function i2c_new_device() needs a model

children.name: mantis_pci_init
children.description: Function mantis_pci_init() needs a model

children.name: pci_get_device
children.description: Function pci_get_device() needs a model

children.name: imx_media_dev_init
children.description: Function imx_media_dev_init() needs a model

children.name: v4l2_device_register_subdev
children.description: Function v4l2_device_register_subdev() needs a model

children.name: pci_map_single
children.description: Function pci_map_single() needs a model

children.name: dvb_usb_device_init
children.description: Function dvb_usb_device_init() needs a model

children.name: v4l2_device_set_name
children.description: Function v4l2_device_set_name() needs a model

children.name: of_device_get_match_data
children.description: Function of_device_get_match_data() needs a model

children.name: dmi_first_match
children.description: Function dmi_first_match() needs a model

children.name: of_match_device
children.description: Function of_match_device() needs a model

children.name: of_match_node
children.description: Function of_match_node() needs a model

children.name: do_map_probe
children.description: Function do_map_probe() needs a model

children.name: i2c_match_id
children.description: Function i2c_match_id() needs a model

children.name: Argument signatures
children.description: Using argument signatures to distinguish objects is not accurate

children.name: Different objects
children.description: Different objects are not considered as the same

children.name: Same objects
children.description: The same objects are considered different

children.name: Nested locks
children.description: Different objects are considered the same but it is possible to distinguish one lock from another one by considering second parameter of "nested" functions

children.name: API models
children.description: API models are not accurate enough or absent at all. These models are important just for checked requirements in contrast to common API models that are necessary for many different requirements

children.name: Linux kernel
children.description: Tags related to Linux kernel API models

children.name: device_lock
children.description: Function device_lock() needs a model

children.name: Bit precision
children.description: Bit precise modeling is required

children.name: Sets/maps model
children.description: The model uses flags, counters and so on that does not allow to distinguih one object from another one

children.name: Check final state
children.description: Checking final state is redundant and should be avoided. It may be more specific in comparison with disabling this in EMG

children.name: CPAchecker
children.description: CPAchecker related tags

children.name: Predicate analysis
children.description: Tags related to predicate analysis in CPAchecker

children.name: Arrays
children.description: CPAchecker predicate analysis tracks only first array elements by default in uf encoding

children.name: Unallocated memory
children.description: CPAchecker predicate analysis considers initialized, but unallocated memory as having any value

children.name: Dynamic structures
children.description: CPAchecker predicate analysis has certain troubles considering lists and other dynamic structures

children.name: Memory functions
children.description: CPAchecker does not support memset, memcpy, etc.

children.name: Bit precision
children.description: CPAchecker does not support bit operations by default

children.name: Function pointer analysis
children.description: Tags related to function pointer analysis in CPAchecker

children.name: BAM
children.description: Tags related to block-abstraction memoization in CPAchecker

children.name: Value analysis
children.description: Tags related to value analysis in CPAchecker

children.name: Assembler code
children.description: Verifier does not interpret assembler code

children.name: String library
children.description: Verifier does not support functions like strlen, strcpy, etc.

children.name: CPAchecker SMG
children.description: Tags related to CPAchecker SMG

children.name: Predicate analysis
children.description: Tags related to predicate analysis in CPAchecker SMG

children.name: Arithmetics
children.description: In CPAchecker SMG arithmetics and assignments of nonexplicit values produces unknown symbolic value, which could result in false overflow report

children.name: Packed/alligned
children.description: CPAchecker SMG does not calculate sizes of packed/alligned structures properly

children.name: Abstraction
children.description: CPAchecker SMG incorrectly reports memory leaks of abstracted list segments

children.name: Dynamic allocation
children.description: If CPAchecker SMG cannot calculate explicit sizes for allocations, it assumes that size is 3 byte

children.name: CPALockator
children.description: CPALockator related tags

children.name: Predicate analysis
children.description: Tags related to predicate analysis in CPALockator

children.name: Memory model
children.description: Problems with simple memory model in CPALockator

children.name: Different structures
children.description: Two different instances of the same structure type is considered to be the same object

children.name: List operations
children.description: Operations with list elements usually should considered as operations with the whole list

children.name: Shared data
children.description: Shared data may be considered to have arbitrary values to guarantee soundness of analysis without effects

children.name: Global infeasibility
children.description: Two racy paths are feasible one by one, but contradicts each other in parallel

children.name: Lock analysis
children.description: Problems with LockCPA

children.name: Ad-hoc synchronization
children.description: Custom synchronization via variables

children.name: Missed synchronization
children.description: The locking function is absent in configuration

children.name: Interrupts
children.description: Specifics of interrupts is not considered

children.name: Signals
children.description: Specifics of signals is not considered

children.name: Conditional locking
children.description: Lock/Unlock operations are conditional, it leads to a set of infeasible paths

children.name: Protected get
children.description: Atomic extraction of a data from shared container, and access to it without locking as to a local one

children.name: BAM
children.description: Problems with BAM CPA

children.name: Thread analysis
children.description: Problems with ThreadCPA

children.name: Shared analysis
children.description: Problems with LocalCPA

children.name: Missed allocation
children.description: The allocation function is absent in configuration

children.name: Shared merge
children.description: Shared analysis is path insensitive, it may miss precise information about locality

children.name: Lightweight mode
children.description: Predicate analysis is absent in lightweight mode

children.name: Auxiliary variables
children.description: The race is found for auxiliary variable in non-target code

children.name: RCU analysis
children.description: Problems with RCU analysis

children.name: Alias analysis
children.description: Alias analysis is not precise enough

children.name: RCU lists
children.description: RCU operations over lists are not completely supported
